backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining products, inventory, sales, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD methods with storage mixins and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old sales records to a new schema with added fields like COGS, productName, and totalTax.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing human-written summaries of multiple frontend source files for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app shell managing view switching and rendering pages including the new SalesReportPage.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal for adjusting inventory stock with validation, backend mutation, and normalized error handling.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Displays dashboard summary cards and payment method totals with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Modal for editing an inventory item with validation, duplicate checks, and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Modal for editing a sale’s payment method and items, including validation and submission to update the record.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Form modal for adding new inventory items with validation, duplicate checks, and stock calculation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory page displaying items, handling add/edit/adjust modals, and managing loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, main menu items, and dropdown submenu for reports, handling view changes.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal form for adding products, including validation and image upload handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Page displaying product list with loading/error states and a modal to add new products.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Modal prompting for product quantity and showing subtotal before confirming.
Reusable error display component with retry handling and special messaging for auth or actor errors.
Sales report page with date filtering, editing/deleting sales, table rendering, and XLS export.
UI for building a cart, selecting quantities, choosing payment, and submitting a sale via recordSale.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's backend role with a safe fallback and avoids breaking UI when unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Loads dashboard summary data from the backend using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context via Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Fetches inventory items and provides mutations to add, update, and adjust stock, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Loads product list and allows adding new products, refreshing the products query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Records a new sale and refreshes dashboard summary after mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Provides update and delete mutations for sales, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Queries sales records for a given time range using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, query client, identity provider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an HTML-based Excel file containing sales report rows and triggers a download of the .xls file.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Provides helpers to normalize inventory item names and check for duplicates with optional ID exclusion.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency and dates for Indonesian locale and maps payment method codes to display labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing scope, UI requirements, architecture notes, and current known issues.
